usage: Used for strength training, resistance workouts, and fitness exercises at home, in classes, or in a gym setting.
key_features: Dumbbell hand weights for exercise and resistance training
Ideal for fitness classes, home gym, or workout area
Cast iron construction with neoprene coating for durability and safety
Printed weight number on each end cap
Hexagonal shape prevents dumbbells from rolling away
ai_description: A pair of compact pink hexagonal dumbbells with a smooth neoprene-coated finish rests on a light surface. Each end cap clearly shows the KAKSS logo and 1.5 KG marking in white, indicating fixed weight. The matte coating suggests a secure, non-slip hand grip.
target_audience: Home exercisers, fitness enthusiasts, and class participants looking for light fixed-weight dumbbells.
product_name: KAKSS Neoprene Workout Fixed Weight Dumbbell (2-Pound, Set Of 2pc)
